post.body: thanks. i appreciate that.
jealous. let's go there when i'm in austin THIS WEEKEND!
one of my favorite movies ever!
oh no! that's sad. prob for the best though.
i just tried searching for people i know and realized that i am old.
i am also surprised.
can't u just use wordpress?
I'd say do a combo.
http://twitpic.com/pwo7 - That's my adorable doggie! Can u send this to me?
FYI - her name is Hattie Jones. Not Hattie Grant.
mine just crashed too.
we better not. i'm not wearing a coat either.
in Austin?
no but they talk about it in the online comic book.
what's that mean - bigger? Choose your words carefully...
me hungwee!
yep.
I'm in an airport!
Dramamine. It's bumpy getting out of LA today.
tell them I said hi.
I vote parachute pants.
yep. Pretty fun and yet funny event.
that's nice.
love that picture!
just a rumor. Not true.
no idea. I only check that account every few weeks. For a quicker reply, please contact my publicist.
that sounds like torture.
no problem. I'm happy so many people came out.
no truth at all. although i'd be honored to play a role like that.
hope people get it. it's pretty tongue in cheek.
no ranch dressing for me! plus, it's kinda sick.
crap. sorry to hear that.
awesome! thanks for posting that!
I had the corn/zucchini mix. It was amazing. So was the rice pudding.
I ate there yesterday too for the first time.
u guys are silly.
roederstudios.com
henry jacobson
is it open today?
was that lt. worf?
i thought they replaced me with another quirky girl. am i wrong?
congrats on the sxsw panel! I'm trying to go this year.
no - sorry. New to me I guess. I'm reading No One Belongs Here More than You. How do I make it thru without crying my eyes out?
I had never seen someone riding one.Seemed a little dangerous if he fell. Where does one ride those (besides in history books)?
it's so cute!
i love it. mind if i use it?
yeah - she's kinda magical.
i'm thinking of doing something very similar today. winter cleaning!!
yep. Kinda boring and long but I think worth watching for the acting.
Put your career first, your life/day job second. Do something to promote your career every day. And try to be positive.
i think so actually.
that was really funny.
it's good. it just seems like an odd trend.
also because i have mean eyes.
email.
http://twitpic.com/xsek - where is that??!
but i'm lazy and don't want to assemble myself. (that's where i'm currently searching though.)
any pet store! But it's a lot of work just so you know.
just did an interview with the los angeles times. thanks for recommending me @greggrunberg!
Gonna be in Austin, Tx in less than a week to speak at the Alamo Drafthouse. Info on my blog - http://www.breagrant.com/blog
Trying to get ready fast enough before @becker gets here...although still taking the time to tweet.
in the mean time, buying presents on austinhandmade.com and toms.com.
on the phone, trying to cancel an old gym membership. been waiting 10 minutes.
and don't forget to watch heroes tonight. get more info on daphne's past and other also interesting stuff.
just used google video for the first time. we have officially entered the future. i'm just waiting for hoverboards.
just went to the farmer's market and got more food...in addition to the pounds and pounds of leftovers i already have.
lazy saturday.
about to watch alien vs. predator 2. i'm betting that the HUMANS win.
Shopping with @nickescott - yes, on Black Friday.
Alright - enough twittering today. Hope everyone has a great day off.
My dog just basically sat on my face. I think that means she's ready for breakfast.
busy day. now getting ready to head out to new club opening.
i swear i do non-frivolous things with my day sometimes too. (i also got my hair done at jonathan salon) tomorrow will save kitties.
retweet from @davegobe save the kitties, save the world.
Just made pumpkin waffles. Technically, Alex made them. But I ate them!
need to pack and get ready to meet up with @cathybaron. doing neither.
oh. just posted a video made by the alamo drafthouse about me visiting on my blog. http://www.breagrant.com/blog/
Gonna go see Milk with friends.
Going to lunch with Brett. Good morning, Austin!
Don't forget to buy your ticket to see me in Austin. Info at http://www.breagrant.com/blog now, time to fly.
Someone just told me I look bigger on tv. I like the idea of people thinking I'm a gigantic woman.
The floor of the phoenix airport has airplanes on it. http://twitpic.com/qeuf
Getting ready to board a plane. I hate flying but brought plenty if movies and snacks so I think I'm gonna make it!
Going to brunch with friends. Wanted to wear a red sweater but with boots, I look like an elf.
Milk (the movie) was amazing.
Oh and my site is back up. ( who can tell I'm bored at the airport? Over-tweeting do to boredom.)
Thanks everyone fir coming to the Drafthouse last night in Austin. It's so much fun to watch Heroes in a huge group of people.
Sorry - apparently my website is down. Going to the airport but I'll remedy it when I'm back in Los Angeles.
Eating some dinner, getting ready to go to the Alamo Drafthouse.
just went to toy joy in austin. now at austin handmade.
don't forget to come see me tonight at alamo drafthouse if you're in austin!
http://budurl.com/xu8e thanks to @juliedarling for doing the guest post on my blog today.
Scream Queens just convinced me to watch Saw 6.
cleaning my house to get ready for guests. also - did anyone see my q & a thing in jezebel magazine?
oh - maybe i should clarify that @michael_bay is not the real michael bay. but that doesn't make his tweets any less funny.
http://www.breagrant.com/blog interview with screen junkies. secret: that's @michael_bay interviewing me. also known as max powers or eric.
got home to an internet running crazy slow. so frustrating. how do i fix this problem?
more eating. i eat a lot with friends in town.
About to have dinner with a lot of Texas friends in LA. Worlds collide.
Calling this week Brecation.
late breakfast makes for a late lunch. and then my stomach gets confused.
pics from austin alamo drafthouse visit posted on my blog - http://www.breagrant.com/blog/
feeling tired but going to breakfast with neesha so also feeling happy!
I want to go to sundance too.
Doing a photo shoot with henry and @cathybaron.
rt - Attn: Grunny fans! Join @heroescast & Greg here: http://tinyurl.com/6nzoox 12/18/08 8PM ET tell him i said hi.
getting ready to go to a young hollywood golden globe party. because of the rain, my outfit choice has completely changed.
the glasses i picked out are very jean binnel - picture as soon as i get the lenses in them.
http://lin.cr/cal one of my fav places in la is having funding probs due to crappy economy. if you live in la, consider becoming a member.
Gonna get glasses today to wear when I'm not in contacts for the first time in 6 years.
I can't believe how many people knew the kind if bike I was talking about was called a Penny Farthing.
Just watched The Future of Food - good topic but not a very "sexy" documentary. Now reading Miranda July's newest book. Lazy day.
i just saw a guy with a handlebar mustache riding an old timey bicycle with a giant front wheel down the bike street in the bike lane.
Why does it start raining the moment I want to leave the house?
my top music picks of the year are at http://www.breagrant.com/blog/
My gym shoes. I know - I'm dorky. http://twitpic.com/xz56
just watched the new guild episode. it's such a good show. it's at http://www.watchtheguild.com if you've never seen it.
Recovering from the holidays.
k. you guys are right. i'm not complaining that people are doing that. i just think it's funny it keeps happening. email is good.
an extraordinary amount of people see me in public, don't say anything and then write me an email about it later.
my dog is so happy to be home. now, trying to find a good bedside table. mine is old and cruddy.
But then a nice man gave me a dollar because the machine wouldn't take my money. So who am I to complain?
In an East Texas airport very early looking to buy a bottle of water. But no - there's only soda.
